articles.title: Asteroid today: 59-foot space rock to make really close approach to Earth, says NASA. Need to worry? - News9 LIVE
articles.description: Asteroid today: NASA says Asteroid 2024 LZ1 is set to fly by very close to Earth. Does it pose any danger? Find out.
articles.content:
Asteroid today that is all set to approach Earth in a very close manner has been dubbed 2024 LZ1, reveals NASA. (Image: NASA)

articles.description: This picture taken with the Hubble Space Telescope features the bright globular cluster Terzan 12, which is a large group of stars that are closely packed together.
